name: FITZGERALD PETERBILT
sampleDescriptions: Technical Barriers to Trade, Article 2 - 2.1, regarding the prohibition of importing glider trucks in to Canada.

The Phase 2 Rule (81 FR 73,478), and the EPA's lack of legal authority over glider vehicles because they are not "new" motor vehicles and glider kits because they do not fall within the Clean Air Act'
Ensuring IRS compliance with the statutory safe harbor found in 26 U.S.C Section 4052(f)(1).
